name: Web3War
storyline: The year is 2092. In Future City, citizens spend days and nights being endlessly entertained by the city’s greatest warriors as they battle for glory, bragging rights, and the spoils of victory in the virtual battleground known as WEB3WAR
summary: Web3War is a full-crossplay and cross-progression enabled competitive first-person shooter for PC and mobile. Web3War has a realistic modern warfare theme and a bright low-poly art style. Players may compete against each other in team deathmatch and free-for-all game modes and customize more than 50 weapons with countless attachments and visual modifications for a near infinite variety of tactical and visual combinations.
